author: ifelsehatsumi
install_msg:
Thanks for installing bio. Use `[p]bio` to see your bio.
Use `[p]bio fieldname some field text` to set profile info or `[p]bio @member` to view someone else's.

You can see all available profile fields with `[p]biofields`, `[p]biofields add [field]` and `[p]biofields remove [field]` to add/remove fields, and `[p]biosearch [field]` to see all users with a certain field.

Use `[p]bioreset` to reset your profile.
name: Bio
description: Create an in-server profile and share it with others.
